title: Help identifying this font? Looks like a heavier version of Copperplate Gothic?
content:
Hi,

Can anyone help me to identify this font? It looks like Copperplate Gothic but it's much heavier.

Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2013-07-01 at 16.57.23.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830134938/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-07-01%20at%2016.57.23.png) | 215.05 KB |
author: adechong

comments.content:
Tiny serifs but not Copperplate Gothic. Recent discussion of the logo: [http://typophile.com/node/102764](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830134938/http:/typophile.com/node/102764 "http://typophile.com/node/102764")  
Don
